Aquí encontrarás algunos de los proyecto: Here you will find some of the projects in which I have been working, they are demo projects to give you an idea of the flexibility that Laravel offers.
Sistema para gestionar restaurantes de c: A system for managing prepared food restaurants. With this system, we can manage all aspects of home delivery food. We can add different prepared food dishes and promote them on the site, as well as add products to the shopping cart. We can also add discount coupons that customers can use when making their online purchase. We also have a blog system to promote products and/or recipes.
